about_the_game: A roguelike game blending city-building and resource management, featuring a dynamic system that generates new buildings daily! Strategize and construct from over 50 unique buildings to create powerful combos, generate military points, and defend your city against increasingly challenging enemy waves. Survive for 100 days to achieve victory. Adapt, optimize, and fortify your city to overcome every obstacle!
